welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Gouvieux, a picturesque city known for its beautiful countryside and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our quaint town has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster connection speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beauvais-Tille Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Beauvais-Tille Airport, primarily used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may experience slow speeds during peak hours.
